sentences.en: A body was found at the bottom of the canal.
sentences.cn: 运河河底发现了一具尸体。。

sentences.en: a shortfall in supplies would knock the bottom out of the engineering industry.
sentences.cn: 物资供应不足会使机械建造业崩溃。

sentences.en: Answers can be found at the bottom of page 8.
sentences.cn: 在第8页末尾可以找到答案。

sentences.en: Can you hold the bottom of the ladder for me?
sentences.cn: 你帮我扶住梯子底部好吗？

sentences.en: Gingerly, she put her hand in deeper, to the bottom.
sentences.cn: 她一只手小心翼翼地往下伸,一直摸到底部.

sentences.en: he knew what was at the bottom of it—Jane wanted them to live together.
sentences.cn: 他知道真正的原因——简想和他生活在一起。

sentences.en: I have to get to the bottom of this mess.
sentences.cn: 我必须查清造成这一混乱局面的真正原因。

sentences.en: I undid the bottom two buttons of my yellow and grey shirt.
sentences.cn: 我解开了自己黄灰相间的衬衫上最下面的两个纽扣。

sentences.en: It’s on the bottom shelf .
sentences.cn: 它在架子的最底层。

sentences.en: Lower the heat and allow the omelet to set on the bottom.
sentences.cn: 关小火让煎蛋的下面凝固。

sentences.en: Malone sat down on the bottom of the bed.
sentences.cn: 马隆在床脚坐下了。

sentences.en: Sales of personal computers have bottomed out.
sentences.cn: 个人电脑的销售跌到了最底点

sentences.en: She lay at the bottom of the stairs, whimpering in pain.
sentences.cn: 她躺在楼梯底部，痛得呜咽着。

sentences.en: She would clean the house from top to bottom.
sentences.cn: 她会把房子彻底打扫一下。

sentences.en: Start at the bottom and try to work your way up.
sentences.cn: 从底层干起，然后努力一步步升上去。

sentences.en: the bottom fell out of the market for classic cars.
sentences.cn: 高级轿车市场暴跌。

sentences.en: the bottom right-hand corner of the page
sentences.cn: 这一页的右下角

sentences.en: The club had slipped to the bottom of Division Four.
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部已经跌为丁级组的最后一名。

sentences.en: The correct answers can be found at the bottom of page 8.
sentences.cn: 正确答案在第8页末尾。

sentences.en: The drugs had been hidden in a suitcase with a false bottom.
sentences.cn: 毒品藏在一个带假底板的行李箱里。

sentences.en: The number at the bottom is the recommended water temperature in Centigrade.
sentences.cn: 底部的数字就是推荐的摄氏水温。

sentences.en: The towels are in the bottom drawer .
sentences.cn: 毛巾在最下面的抽屉里。

sentences.en: There's an extra blanket in the bottom drawer of the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 壁橱最下面的抽屉里还有一条多余的毯子。

sentences.en: we began to study history from the bottom up.
sentences.cn: 我们从头学历史。

sentences.en: We're bottom of the league and we have to get stuck in.
sentences.cn: 我们是联赛的最后一名，所以我们必须拼命赶超。

sentences.en: What they do offer is a good product at a rock-bottom price.
sentences.cn: 他们提供的确实是物美价廉的产品。

sentences.en: you can bet your bottom dollar it'll end in tears.
sentences.cn: 可以确定，这要以眼泪收场。

sentences.en: You’ve got some butter on your bottom lip .
sentences.cn: 你下嘴唇上粘了点黄油。

words.tran_cn: 无底的；深不可测的；难解的；取之不尽的
给（鞋子）装底；查明…的原因；使到达底部（bottom的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 底孔， 井底；下部孔；底部炮眼
跌到谷底：跌到可能的最底点，在其后只有一个回升会发生

phrases.phrase: from the bottom to one's heart

phrases.tran_cn: 从最底层做起；从头学起
探明…的真相；弄清…的起因；寻到…的根子
出现暴跌（或垮台）的局面
(非正式，主 北美)深信，确信

trans.tran_en: in the lowest place or position

trans.tran_cn: 底部，尽头，最末位置，臀部，套装的裙（裤）
